title: Riot can't do anything even if they wanted to about our complains... here is why...
body:
An economical report about gaming stated this taking lol as the biggest of all examples

The authors of the report believe that the Chinese government's strict market regulations have encouraged Chinese developers to acquire international games and intellectual property for the purpose of repackaging them for Chinese audiences.

Source :

https://dotesports.com/the-op/news/international-game-devs-losing-out-chinese-market-24021

China wants to turn theirs acquisitions into chinese products.

In a nutshell they are turning LoL into a chinese culture flagship game to export and promote chinese culture aroumd the world... that's why china is buying all famous new companies and games...

Now you know why we don't have zombies or gothic looking character in the game anymore. Because those are flagship of the occidental culture...

Just look at xin splash art and there are so many other examples...

they are trying to promote chinese culture over the world with lol. Which means that majority of the game thematics and art will be centered around chinese and asiatic culture.

The guy which sold majority of the company to the chinese should face the tribunal of players...
